mapper.select: select count(1) from class_info where name=#{name} and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.update: update class_info set name=#{name} where id=#{id} and del_flag=#{delFlag}
update class_info set del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} where id=#{id}
update class_info set grade_id=(select id from grade_info where id=#{gradeId} and del_flag=#{delFlag}) where id=#{id} and del_flag=#{delFlag}
